trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded" /> and <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved" /> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para os eventos de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded" /> e de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved" /> .

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved> events.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls are added to the form and connected to the `addControl_Click` and `removeControl_Click` event handling methods.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo requer que dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controles são adicionados ao formulário e conectados para o `addControl_Click` e `removeControl_Click` métodos de manipulação de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to store in this event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> a ser armazenado nesse evento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs" /> class for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs" /> para controle especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved> events.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls are added to the form and connected to the `addControl_Click` and `removeControl_Click` event handling methods.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo requer que dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controles são adicionados ao formulário e conectados para o `addControl_Click` e `removeControl_Click` métodos de manipulação de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control object used by this event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto de controle usado por este evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> used by this event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> usado por este evento.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved> events.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls are added to the form and connected to the `addControl_Click` and `removeControl_Click` event handling methods.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo requer que dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controles são adicionados ao formulário e conectados para o `addControl_Click` e `removeControl_Click` métodos de manipulação de eventos.
